description:
This kind old Clock Tower Guard is the first resident of the town of http://anidb.net/ch40121 [Koriko] whom http://anidb.net/ch11210 [Kiki] talks to.
He informs the girl that he hasn`t seen a witch in this town for quite a while (and from his clock tower he would certainly see a witch flying on her broom), thus encouraging Kiki to make this town her new residence.
name: Tokeiban no Ojisan
